subject: XML tree assertion
msgSnippet: Just would like to know if anyone has already developed an assertion class to test two DOM trees and willing to see it added to the junit-addons library.
messageBody:
Just would like to know if anyone has already developed an assertion
class to test two DOM trees and willing to see it added to the
junit-addons library.

-Vladimir
